name: Frog Rush (blakeb1)
description:
I'm not going to update this again, it's been a while since the jam has ended, and I don't feel like doing much more for this. The most important thing is that I've learned more!

I'd like to hear all your suggestions and ways to improve newer games that I will create! I know there's probably a lot that can be worked on, so if you want to only mention the major issues that's okay.

Game Tip: Do not always try to 'tongue grapple' the enemies, sometimes the best way to deal with an enemy is to not deal with it! Avoiding the projectiles, then going for an attack is a good idea.

Game Fixed for HTML and Windows!

Created by Blake.
